intro.speaker: Cain
intro.line: Kris's 7th Platoon! You have fought valiantly thus far. It has been a joy being your instructor!

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: Frey, Cain; I have heard reports from both of them. Though your individual strengths vary, there exists no doubt of your excellence. Thus, today we will hold your final practical exam. Make sure that you are thoroughly prepared.

intro.speaker: Cain
intro.line: The final preparations have been made! We are now ready to begin! Your opponent in the final exam shall be...

intro.speaker: Cain
intro.line: Myself: Cain, knight of Altea! I'll show you the sort of battle that real knights face!

intro.speaker: Est
intro.line: Est, ex-Whitewing of Macedon, at your service. I won't go easy on you!

battle.speaker: Cain
battle.line: You have come well prepared. But you must be wary that the enemies you see are not always your only ones!

battle.speaker: Est
battle.line: I can tell that you aspire to be something great. But you'd better not think that your only enemies are those that you can see.

boss.speaker: Cain
boss.line: Here we go! Give it your all!

boss.speaker: Est
boss.line: Here I come! I wonder, can you keep up with me?

end.speaker: Cain
end.line: Congratulations, you won! There is nothing more we can teach you.

end.speaker: Est
end.line: As I thought...It pains me to say this, but you were really strong. I don't think you can call yourselves apprentices any more!

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Hm. Well then, Kris's 7th Platoon; I will announce the results of the second half of your training right here, right now. As before, your score depends on the amount of companions who were forced to make an early exit. Listen carefully. Your performance has been...

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Most impressive! Even amongst the past Altean knights, there has not been a group with such high credentials as yours! Therefore...

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Ahem, not bad! Compared to other aspiring knights in the past, you have done very well. And so...

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Hmm... This is extremely difficult for me to say. You have many injured... But you deserve credit for winning all your battles until now. Therefore...

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Kris's 7th Platoon, I have decided that you have passed your final test!

end.speaker: Ryan
end.line: We passed... So that means we're...

end.speaker: Luke
end.line: Alright, we did it! We can become knights!

end.speaker: Cecil
end.line: We did it. After this, I'm going to buy myself a nice sword, and a hefty lance... Oooh, it's getting me excited just thinking about it! Heh heh heh heh...

end.speaker: Roderick
end.line: ...Cecil, you're scaring me. But you're not alone in excitement. My lifelong dream has at last been realized.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Everyone looks so happy. I guess it's because we're all to be knights! We really did it, Kris.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Yeah. It was my grandfather's and my own dearest wish to become an Altean knight. I can now work for Altea and serve Prince Marth. So I've all the reason to be happy.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Indeed. I'm happy too...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: ...... Ah, Kris. What are you doing up so late at night?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: I can't seem to sleep. What about you, Katarina?

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: I... well... There's a lot on my mind, I suppose. ...Kris, have I ever told you about the town I was born in?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Now that you mention it, you're never told me anything about your hometown. It wasn't Altea?

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: I was born in a town called Knorda. Have you ever heard of it? I... know it all too well. In Knorda, I was treated like an animal, beaten for fun. Whenever I couldn't stand the pain, I'd just close my eyes and think of nothing, taking refuge within my heart's confines...

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Katarina...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: ...But someone was there to save me. She showed me the meaning of life. I felt that I would do anything for her. Kris, do you have someone like that in your life?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Yes. To remain loyal to a lord: that's the sort of knight I aim to be.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Yes, that's right. You're also doing it for someone else... Not long now, is it...? It won't be long until we become Altean knights. When that happens... ......... Good night, Kris.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Well then, time to get some rest...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: U-um, Kris! I'm sorry, I forgot one thing... Please take this, if you would.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: What's this? A headband?

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: It's from Cecil. "Give this to the new platoon commander," she said. Supposedly if you wear this, you'll be more... "psyched". Cecil really wants you to wear it.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: So once I put this on, I'll have a hairstyle like Cecil's? But will being like Cecil really suit me?

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: I'm sure it would. Oh, I know! How about you just try it on? If you try it and it feels a little strange, you can just go back to your original hairstyle.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Oh, good point...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Well, how about it? Want to change your hairstyle?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Alright, let's give it a try. It'll be fun becoming like Cecil.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Wonderful! Cecil is sure to be stoked. I look forward to seeing your new look. See you tomorrow then, Kris.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: No, let's stop here. My hairstyle is fine as it is.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Oh, is that so? That's too bad. I was looking forward to see your new look, too... Ah, I'll go return this then. See you tomorrow, Kris.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Alright, let's give it a try. I'll try arranging my hair so that it's like Cecil's.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Wonderful! Cecil is sure to be happy with your decision. I look forward to seeing your new look. See you tomorrow then, Kris.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: No, I think I'm alright. My hairstyle is fine as it is.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Oh, is that so? That's too bad. I was looking forward to see your new look, too... Ah, I'll go return this then. See you tomorrow, Kris.
